duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for all front end processes, including opening, closing, training, and delegation of tasks to team members.
Ensure a positive shopping experience for customers and perform Supervisor functions regularly.
Manage all front end audit and cash compliance responsibilities, and maintain 5S standards in all areas.
Drive productivity by training, coaching, counseling employees, planning, monitoring, and appraising job results.
Contribute to a customer-focused environment, communicate clearly with customers, team, and leadership, and work effectively independently and within a team.
Maintain a positive attitude, work with a sense of urgency, and handle multiple tasks where priorities shift with the demands of the business.
